Articles.Content:
I know, I know. The console tech support forum is more dead Jeb. But, 

I took a part off that had symmetry, then clicked, "undo last" 

AND POOF! 

The cursor's gone

Ah ha! Ya. This is a real issue. I have not mention this issue but ya. This can happen. I would recommend just closing and restarting the game. If you would like this issue to be brought up by the KSP Devs please report this on the Bug Tracker.
